LanguageData.CockBladderPleasure.label: (欢愉)阴茎:膀胱
LanguageData.CockBladderPleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入膀胱
LanguageData.CockBladderPleasure.description: 捕食者通过阴茎将猎物存入膀胱，用于获取性快感。
LanguageData.VaginalBladderPleasure.label: (欢愉)阴道:膀胱
LanguageData.VaginalBladderPleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入膀胱
LanguageData.VaginalBladderPleasure.description: 捕食者通过阴道将猎物存入膀胱，用于获取性快感。
LanguageData.CleavagePleasure.label: (欢愉)乳沟
LanguageData.CleavagePleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入乳沟
LanguageData.CleavagePleasure.description: 捕食者通过乳沟容纳猎物以获取性快感。
LanguageData.MembranePleasure.label: (欢愉)皮下
LanguageData.MembranePleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而通过皮肤吸收{1}
LanguageData.MembranePleasure.description: 捕食者以黏液状吸收方式将猎物纳入体内以获取性快感。
LanguageData.NavelPleasure.label: (欢愉)脐部
LanguageData.NavelPleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入脐部
LanguageData.NavelPleasure.description: 捕食者通过脐部容纳猎物以获取性快感。
LanguageData.TailmawPleasure.label: (欢愉)尾口
LanguageData.TailmawPleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入尾喉
LanguageData.TailmawPleasure.description: 捕食者通过尾部开口将猎物存入尾喉部位以获取性快感。
LanguageData.UdderPleasure.label: (欢愉)乳房
LanguageData.UdderPleasure.actionDescription: {0}正为寻求快感而将{1}纳入乳房
LanguageData.UdderPleasure.description: 捕食者通过乳房容纳猎物以获取性快感。
